<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>

    <form action="/search" method="get" novalidate="true">
        <div class="input-group searchbox-input">
            <div class="form-control"><input type="text" id="searchboxAutocomplete" class="searchbox-suggestion js-searchbox-suggestion-input" autocomplete="off">

            <div class="input-group-btn">
                <button class="searchbox-close btn btn-default" type="reset">

                </button>

(function() {
    if (!EM.is_logged_in) return;
    var a = document.querySelector('#my_account');
    a.setAttribute('href', '/user/myaccount?ref=ua_personal_data');
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        var i = a.querySelector('.navbar-icon');
        i.replaceWith(PH.node(EM.TMPL.exec('@Components/NavbarDropdowns/avatar.html.twig', {
            user_avatar: EM.user_avatar,
            has_club_membership: EM.user_data && EM.user_data.has_club_membership
        })));
    });
})();
</script>

<section class="page-section">
            <a id="profiled_categories_m_home" class="scroll-anchor"></a>
            <div class="container"><div class="title-container">
                        <h2 class="page-section-title clearfix flex-item">
                            <span class="js-section-title">Laptopuri</span>

        </section><section class="page-section mrg-sep-sm pad-sep-xs homepage-slider-section">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="page-section-title">Noutati</h2><div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-3 mrg-sep-xs">
                <a href="https://www.emag.ro/shop-by-room/deco-story?ref=content-widget ">
                    <img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db//61/91543.jpg" class="img-holder">
                </a>
            </div><div class="col-xs-3 mrg-sep-xs">
                <a href="https://www.emag.ro/cmp/outlet-emag/">
                    <img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db//63/93752.jpg" class="img-holder">
                </a>
            </div><div class="col-xs-3 mrg-sep-xs">
                <a href="https://www.emag.ro/cmp/campanie-gradinarit?ref=content-widget">
                    <img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db//61/90779.jfif" class="img-holder">
                </a>
            </div><div class="col-xs-3 mrg-sep-xs">
                <a href="https://www.emag.ro/lp/testeaza-salteaua-101-nopti-si-retur-gratuit?ref=content-widget ">
                    <img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db//61/91553.jpg" class="img-holder">
                </a>
            </div>
        </div></div>
    </section><section class="page-section">
    <div class="container pad-sep-xs"><div class="widget-banner">
    <div class="dfp-banner-container js-dfp-banner-container dfp-home-banner-widget btn-block no-underline" id="tpb-home-banner-1" data-fallback-img-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db//54/80817.png" data-fallback-img-title="eMAG - Aplicatie mobile" data-fallback-url="https://m.emag.ro/aplicatie_mobile?ref=banner_12"><a href="https://m.emag.ro/aplicatie_mobile?ref=banner_12"><img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db//54/80817.png" title="eMAG - Aplicatie mobile" alt="eMAG - Aplicatie mobile"></a></div>
